column4: hey i got ubuntu but when i installed it before it ran slow because i only have 128mb of memory. is there any way to free memory to make it run smoother?
you can try running xfce4 for a leaner desktop environment, but those bloated apps like OOo will never run fast on older hardware unforutnately
that sounds like sufficient hardware to me
anyway, xfce4 is worth a look
